title: Get search suggestions
description: Returns up to three collections of search suggestions all based on the passed in search term: Autosuggestions - suggestions based on similar search terms popular with the Trade Me community Recent searches - suggestions based on previous searches the logged in member has performed Category suggestions - suggestions based on categories similar to the passed in search term.

query.name: category_id
query.description: The identifier of the category to be used when generating suggestions, use 0 for all categories. Defaults to 0.

query.name: max_auto_suggestions
query.description: The maximum number of autosuggest suggestions to be returned. Defaults to 12.

query.name: max_category_suggestions
query.description: The maximum number of category suggestions to be returned. Defaults to 12.

query.name: max_recent_searches
query.description: The maximum number of recent searches to be returned. Defaults to 12.

query.name: max_total_suggestions
query.description: The maximum number of suggestions of all types to be returned. Defaults to 12.

query.name: search_string
query.description: The partial keyword that the suggestions will be based on.

fields.name: RecentSearches
fields.description: List of search terms the logged in member has recently searched for ordered by most recent first.

fields.name: AutoSuggestions
fields.description: List of suggested search terms based on terms popular with Trade Me members ordered by their popularity.

fields.name: SearchTerm
fields.type:
SearchTerm 
 String or null 

The search term Trade Me members have been using.



 SearchTermCategorySuggestions 
 Collection of <SearchTermCategory> or null 

Categories we suggest you search for the search term in. This is only populated if you are searching in all categories.






 Id 
 Integer 

The ID of the category.



 Description 
 String or null 

The description for the suggested category.
fields.description: String or null

fields.name: SearchTerm
fields.description: The search term Trade Me members have been using.

fields.name: SearchTermCategorySuggestions
fields.description: Categories we suggest you search for the search term in. This is only populated if you are searching in all categories.

Id

fields.name: Id
fields.description: The ID of the category.

fields.name: Description

fields.name: CategorySuggestions
fields.description: List of category suggestions that that are relevant to the given search term.

fields.name: Id
fields.type:
Id 
 Integer 

The ID of the suggested category.



 Name 
 String or null 

The name of the suggested category.



 AncestorsNames 
 Collection of String or null 

A list of names of the suggested categories ancestors. Collection is ordered from root to leaf.
fields.description: Integer

fields.name: Id
fields.description: The ID of the suggested category.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name of the suggested category.

fields.name: AncestorsNames
fields.description: A list of names of the suggested categories ancestors. Collection is ordered from root to leaf.

fields.name: StoreSuggestions
fields.description: List of store suggestions that are relevant to the given search term.

fields.name: MemberId
fields.type:
MemberId 
 Integer 

The ID of the suggested store.



 StoreName 
 String or null 

The name of the suggested store.



 StorePath 
 String or null 

The path of the suggested store.



 Description 
 String or null 

The description of the suggested store.



 LogoImageUri 
 String or null 

The profile logo image URL of the suggested store.
